title: [Lead Quality] Customer is not fully satisfied with the conversion rate of buyleads. (1 reports)

top_problems.problem: Customer is not fully satisfied with the conversion rate of buyleads.

examples: Investigate the quality of leads being provided to the customer and explore options for improving lead targeting or filtering.
Investigate and correct category-city targeting settings to ensure relevant leads are delivered. Implement stricter lead filtering mechanisms.
